```{r Validation rule 13: "The patient record contains a NEC form with an infection date that is not within the time frame of a documented enrolment."}

problems <- problems |>
  bind_rows(
    patients |>
      inner_join(
        enrollments |>
          inner_join(data$necs, join_by(key == enrollment)),
        join_by(key == patient)) |>
      filter(occurredAt < ENROLMENT_DATE | occurredAt < admission_occurredAt | occurredAt > SURVEILLANCE_END_DATE) |>
      mutate(
        ENROLMENT_DATE = ENROLMENT_DATE,
        EVENT_ID = event,
        EVENT_TYPE = event_types("NEC"),
        EVENT_DATE = occurredAt,
        PROBLEM_ID = 13L,
        ENROLMENT_ADMISSION_DATE = ENROLMENT_DATE,
        ADMISSION_ADMISSION_DATE = admission_occurredAt,
        SURVEILLANCE_END_DATE = SURVEILLANCE_END_DATE,
        NEC_DATE = occurredAt,
        .keep = "unused") |>
      select(
        SITE_CODE,
        DEPARTMENT_CODE,
        DEPARTMENT_NAME,
        DEPARTMENT_OU,
        NEOIPC_PATIENT_ID,
        PATIENT_TEI,
        ENROLMENT_ID,
        ENROLMENT_DATE,
        EVENT_ID,
        EVENT_TYPE,
        EVENT_DATE,
        PROBLEM_ID,
        ENROLMENT_ADMISSION_DATE,
        ADMISSION_ADMISSION_DATE,
        SURVEILLANCE_END_DATE,
        NEC_DATE
        ) |>
      anti_join(
        exceptions,
        join_by(
          PROBLEM_ID,
          SITE_CODE,
          DEPARTMENT_CODE,
          NEOIPC_PATIENT_ID,
          ENROLMENT_DATE,
          EVENT_TYPE,
          EVENT_DATE)) |>
      select(!DEPARTMENT_CODE))
```
